text: Di Hagataalunga o God gu hagahonu Zechariah tama daane Jehoiada, tangada hai mee dabu. Mee gaa duu i di gowaa dela e gidee nia daangada gaa wolo gi nua, “God e heeu be goodou e aha ala digi hagalongo gi nia helekai Dimaadua, ga dagi mai di haingadaa gi goodou! Goodou gu diiagi a Mee, gei Mee hogi gu diiagi goodou!”24.20 Matthew 23.35; Luke 11.51
